contents.text: Thank you for calling PagerDuty, your cloud-based incident response platform.
Press '1' for incident management support and technical assistance.
Please hold while we connect you to our urgent incident escalation team.

navigationGoals: I need to escalate a critical production incident immediately
I need urgent assistance to restore critical incident alerts that have stopped triggering.
I need to escalate a P1 incident—our primary web service is down and we need immediate on‐call support.
My website is down and I need immediate assistance to restore service.
I need to escalate an urgent incident in our physics lab monitoring system to get it noticed immediately.

contents.text: Press '2' for general technical support inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to our general technical support specialists.

navigationGoals: I need assistance with a non-urgent technical issue
I need help configuring my team’s on-call schedule and notification settings.
I need help troubleshooting my API integration; I’m getting authentication failures calling the PagerDuty REST API.
I'm having trouble logging into my PagerDuty dashboard; can you help me?
I need help troubleshooting my PagerDuty integration with the lab’s environmental sensors.

contents.text: Press '2' for sales, new account, and product information.
Press '1' for sales and new account setup.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I want to set up a new account and learn about product options
I want to set up a new PagerDuty account for my veteran-run organization.
I’d like to set up a new business account with SSO via Okta and discuss enterprise feature tiers.
I'd like to sign up for a new PagerDuty account and need help getting started.
I want to open a new PagerDuty account for my campus research team.

contents.text: Press '2' for billing and subscription inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and subscription department.

navigationGoals: I need to review and update my billing and subscription information
I need to update my billing information and review my subscription status.
I need to review our subscription invoice, clarify the overage charges for SMS alerts, and adjust our plan.
I have questions about my latest bill and need help updating my payment method.
I have a billing question about my student subscription and its renewal terms.
